about_the_game:
This is a region of the Iraq map. You can purchase the entire map here: DCS: Iraq. 

DCS: Iraq North

Dive into the rugged terrains and historically significant regions of Northern Iraq. This module offers a richly detailed environment featuring the mountainous landscapes, rivers, and urban centres that have been central to numerous military operations. From the ancient city of Mosul to the oil-rich fields of Kirkuk, Northern Iraq presents a challenging and varied theatre.

Test your skills in navigation, combat, and tactical planning as you fly over a region that blends natural beauty with strategic importance. This is the perfect environment for an immersive experience to practise engaging in air-to-air combat or providing support to ground forces.

Key Features

  • Accurate Northern Iraq Map: High-resolution terrain including key areas such as:

    • Baghdad

    • Sulaymaniyah

    • Erbil

  • Authentic Air Bases: Detailed representations of:

    • Baghdad International airport

    • Balad Air Base

    • Qayyarah Air Base

    • Erbil International Airport

    • And many others

  • Challenging Terrain: Navigate mountains, valleys, and rivers with realistic topography.

  • Strategic Sites: Dams, bridges, and critical infrastructure.

  • Mission Diversity: A variety of missions reflecting historical conflicts and modern-day scenarios.

  • Aircraft Compatibility: Fully compatible with existing DCS World aircraft modules.

Early Access Features

  • High-Resolution Terrain: Initial release featuring essential terrain elements

  • Operational Airfields: Functional air bases with basic operational facilities.

  • Initial Missions: A set of single-player missions to begin your Northern Iraq experience.

  • Multiplayer Functionality: Full support for cooperative and competitive multiplayer gameplay.

Features Coming During Early Access

  • Terrain Enhancements: Additional details in landscapes, urban areas, and natural environments.

  • Expanded Landmarks: Inclusion of historical and cultural sites, enhancing the realism of the region.

  • Advanced Environmental Effects: Regional weather phenomena such as mountainous fog and wind patterns.

  • Additional Missions and Campaigns: More content reflecting both historical events and fictional scenarios.

  • AI Improvements and Optimizations: Enhanced AI behaviours and system performance updates.

name: DCS: Iraq North

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • Requires:Digital Combat Simulator
    OS: Windows 10, 11
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 3.0Ghz+ with 4+ cores
  • RAM: 8GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 4GB+
  • DLC size: 75.5GB
  • Input: Joystick
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended
  • Requires:Digital Combat Simulator
    OS: Windows 10, 11
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 4.5Ghz+ with 8+ cores
  • RAM: 32GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 8GB+
  • DLC size: 75.5GB
  • Input: Joystick / Throttle / Pedals / VR

short_description: Dive into the rugged terrains and historically significant regions of Northern Iraq. This module offers a richly detailed environment featuring the mountainous landscapes, rivers, and urban centres that have been central to numerous military operations.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian*, Czech, French, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
